charges.charge_disposition: It is the judgment of the crt that the dft is hereby committed to the cust of the BOP to be impris for a term of 51 mos; shall serve a supv rel period of 3 yrs; and shall pay mandatory spec assmt in the sum of $50.00 to the U.S. of America. Spec conds of supv rel: As directed by the po, the dft shall participate in a drug-treatment prog, including couseling and testing and shall pay any bal remaining of the spec assmt. The crt recommends that the pl of service be at a facility in Southern California, and that the dft be permitted to participate in an intensive-drug treatment prog and the prog of a boot camp. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:924 (c) Use of Firearm During Crime of Violence; 18:924 (d) Forfeiture of Firearm (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Govts mtn to dismiss ct 2 granted (2)
